name: Team VCard generator
author: bluminson

sections.description:
Team Vcard Generator lets you create personal cards of members of the company and then get a personalized URL and a QR-Code for each.
Visitors to your site can download the contact on their Android, Iphone or Outlook in VCF format.
You can include this url on your business card.
sections.installation:
1. Upload team-vcard-generator.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
    1.== Frequently Asked Questions ==

Is there a limit in the number of members I can add?

Yes, the free version is limited to 10 members.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Structure parent/child and relations between cards
  • QR-Code integrated
  • New options and values in the cards

1.0

  • Use Team VCard generator to create smarter busimess cards.
